content.raw:
Some issues detected:

* The router have solid blue colors but it does not say finished until the simulator finishes.
* The deploy.sh script looks for a the cloudsim_portal.json in a file under /home/osrf/... If you're using a local cloudsim is not going to work.
* vrc_monitor should be disabled
* vrc_bytecounter upstart job is not doing the exec call to the vrc_bytecounter binary
content.html:
Some issues detected:

  • The router have solid blue colors but it does not say finished until the simulator finishes.
  • The deploy.sh script looks for a the cloudsim_portal.json in a file under /home/osrf/... If you're using a local cloudsim is not going to work.
  • vrc_monitor should be disabled
  • vrc_bytecounter upstart job is not doing the exec call to the vrc_bytecounter binary
